Text: Travel and Language Tips from Parlos Cultural NewsletterDear Subscriber Attached please find your Parlo Cultural Newsletter You can open the attached newsletter as you would any other attachment by downloading the attached file to one of your directories and then opening it in a browser If you would like to receive Parlos Cultural Newsletter in html please go to the My Parlo section of our website at parlohomemyparlomyparloenasp and change your preference from text format to html format in our subscription center If you have any problems please visit our Help section at parlohelpfaqemailenasp Thanks and we hope you enjoy this months newsletter There are two ways to receive your newsletter in the body of your email or in the form of an attachment If you receive your newsletter as an attachment please see the directions below AOL users Download the attached message by clicking the Download button in the lower right corner of your email screen When downloading the message you will need to remember where you download the message to in order to retrieve it later An easy place to download to is your desktop Open the folder where you downloaded the message and double click the downloaded file or minimize AOL and click on the downloaded file on your desktop The file should open and you will now have what appears to be a web page Other Users Download the attached message by clicking on the attachment icon in the upper right corner of the email message You will need to remember where you download the message to in order to retrieve it later An easy place to download to is your desktop Open the folder where you downloaded the message and double click the downloaded file or minimize your email application ex Lotus Notes and click on the downloaded file on your desktop The file should open and you will now have what appears to be a web page If you have any difficulties opening your eLesson please contact us and our technical team will assist you parlohtm
